var d;
var r;
var y;
var z;
var x;
var a;
var j;
var b;
var k;
var e;
var c;
var m;
var n;
d := 17;
r := 5;
read y;
read z;
while y != 0 do
    x := y + z;
    a := 3;
    j := 1;
    while j != 100 do
        k := a + z;
        b := j * z;
        d := (y + z) * d;
        e := (x + z) * r;
        j := j + 1;
    end
    c := a + y;
    m := y * b;
    n := r * y;
    write n;
    y := y - 1;
end
